wiki.content:
Wayne Shorter - tenor sax
 Herbie Hancock  - piano
 Ron Carter - bass
 Elvin Jones - drums
 Freddie Hubbard - trumpet
 Recorded December 24, 1964
 Originally released on the album Speak No Evil BLP 4194

wiki.summary:
Wayne Shorter - tenor sax
 Herbie Hancock  - piano
 Ron Carter - bass
 Elvin Jones - drums
 Freddie Hubbard - trumpet
 Recorded December 24, 1964
 Originally released on the album Speak No Evil BLP 4194

track.name: Speak No Evil
comments: yes goog talking all the time  ... great track  ++++
a classic, and a lesson to all
This is what jazz is all about.
oh i so dig this one.
Isn't that Jimmy Branly on percussion?

Greetings,

This is quite interesting.  I just somehow wish they used the Rhodes-Fender... but maybe not.  Who knows??
"brokenears"

Greetings,
The more I hear this, the more I consider this one of the best HardBop recordings I have heard.  All of the elements are there and beyond the next best thing.
Yes, this is where it's at.
Rhodes
